div.sent: We are children.
We have many rights to live peacefully in the society.
Now we will know some rights for all classes of people in the society.
These rights are known as fundamental rights.
Let us read some main fundamental rights in the following table?
All human beings are independent by birth.
All deserves the right to get security.
None can be tortured.
All are equal in the eyes of law.
Nobody is subject to be arrested and without any reason.
None can be deprived of his assets.
Everybody deserves the right to follow their own religion.
Everybody deserves the right to get education.
We will be aware of these fundamental rights.
We live together with father and mother in the family.

We live together with father and mother in the family.
In every family there live different men and women of different ages.
There are elderly people in our families i.e. mother, father, elder brother and sister.
In the family there are rights not only for seniors but also for juniors.
There are both male and female members in a family.
For example, a father and a brother are the male members.
Grandfather, uncle, maternal grandfather and uncle are also male members.
Likewise, a mother and a sister are female members.
Grandmother, aunt, maternal grandmother, maternal aunt are the female members of the family.
Let us fill up the following columns by ourselves?
Let us read them in the following column.
Right to clothes Right to get necessary clothes.
Right to live in any place Right to live in a better place.
Right to have necessary medical treatment for the members of all ages.
Right to get education for all members at a suitable age.
Right to security Right to have security for the members of all ages.
These rights are also applicable to both children and adults.
We will be aware of these rights of us and other members in the family.
We will also be careful so that nobody may lose his/her rights in the family.
They are domestic helps.
They also have some fundamental rights as human beings.
All should behave well with the house-workers.
We must not torture them physically and mentally.
It is our duty to fulfil all their rights.
People of different religions live in society.
In our country there are Muslims, Hindus, Buddhists, Christians, etc.
In every religion there are various festivals.
People of different professions live in our society.
Let us read the names of various professionals in the following table.
The activities of all professionals are important.
So we will not regard anyone as inferior.
We will respect all.
The people of all professions have fundamental rights.
We will always be aware of claiming our fundamental rights.
We will not do anything which may violate the rights of others.
